thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Sandra

author: Sandra
title: Sandra
text: I have IBS and GERD and tried medications that my doctor prescribed,, however the medication's side effects caused other issues in my health. After researching for a natural product online, I found Similase and it worked for me compared to the prescribed medications from my doctor. Instead of taking prescribed medications, I now take natural enzyme supplements daily and within a week I noticed my health has improved and have more energy. I am a registered nurse in my 50's and I feel like I am in my 20's!
